Package com.threecrickets.prudence.cache

Interface Summary
Cache An interface for cache backends to be used with GeneratedTextResource .
 

Class Summary
CacheEntry A serializable, cacheable set of parameters from which StringRepresentation or ByteArrayRepresentation instances can be created.
ChainCache Allows chaining of caches together in order, where the faster, less reliable caches are assumed to be before the slower, more reliable caches.
FakeCache Stores nothing.
H2Cache An H2 database cache.
HazelcastCache A Hazelcast-backed cache.
HazelcastCacheMongoDbMapStore<K,V> A Hazelcast persistence implementation over MongoDB.
HazelcastCacheTagsMongoDbMapStore<K,V> A Hazelcast persistence implementation over MongoDB.
HazelcastMongoDbMapStore<K,V> A Hazelcast persistence implementation over MongoDB.
InProcessMemoryCache An in-process (heap) memory cache.
MemcachedCache A memcached-backed cache over the spymemcached client library.
MongoDbCache A MongoDB-backed cache.
SqlCache A SQL-backed cache.
